availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Presley (Hopkins/ Webster County, Ky, farmer and laborer )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Tennessee native. Son of William Presley and Mahala Presley. Married to Sarah Presley. Father of Rachel F. Presley, John W. Presley, Sarah E. Presley, Charles S. Presley, and Martha A. Presley. Laborer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 157A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 623.
